Verses: 1 aiyo! Ushnakaalaththuk Kanigalai Serththu, Dhraatchappazhangalai Aruththapinbu Varugiravanaippol Irukkiren; Pusikkiradharku Oru Dhraatchakkulaiyum En Aaththumaa Ichchiththa Mudhal Aruppin Kaniyum Illai.
2 dhesaththil Bakthiyullavan Atrupponaan; Manusharil Semmaiyaanavan Illai; Avargalellaarum Raththanchindhap Padhivirukkiraargal; Avanavan Thanthan Sagodharanai Valaiyile Pidikka Vettaiyaadugiraan.
3 pollaappu Seyya Avargal Irandu Kaigalum Nandraaik Koodum; Adhipadhi Kodu Engiraan; Nyaayaadhipadhi Kaikkooli Ketkiraan; Periyavan Than Thuraasaiyaith Therivikkiraan; Ivvidhamaaip Purattugiraargal.

4 avargalil Nallavan Mutchedikkoththavan, Semmaiyaanavan Nerinjilaippaarkkilum Kadunkoormaiyaanavan; Un Kaavarkaarar Ariviththa Un Thandanaiyin Naal Varugiradhu; Ippozhudhe Avargalukkuk Kalakkam Undu.
5 snegidhanai Visuvaasikkavendaam, Vazhikaattiyai Nambavendaam; Un Madiyile Paduththukkollugiravalukku Munbaaga Un Vaayaith Thiravaamal Echcharikkaiyaayiru.
6 magan Thagappanai Ganaveenappaduththugiraan; Magal Than Thaaikku Virodhamaagavum, Marumagal Than Maamikku Virodhamaagavum Ezhumbugiraargal; Manushanudaiya Saththurukkal Avan Veettaardhaane.
7 naanovendraal Karththarai Nokkikkondu, En Ratchippin Dhevanukkuk Kaaththiruppen; En Dhevan Ennaik Kettaruluvaar.
8 en Saththuruve, Enakku Virodhamaai Sandhoshappadaadhe; Naan Vizhundhaalum Ezhundhiruppen; Naan Irulile Utkaarndhaal Karththar Enakku Velichchamaayiruppaar.

9 naan Karththarukku Virodhamaagap Paavancheydhen; Avar Enakkaaga Vazhakkaadi En Nyaayaththai Visaarikkumattum Avarudaiya Kobaththai Sumappen; Avar Ennai Velichchaththile Konduvaruvaar, Avarudaiya Needhiyaip Paarppen.
10 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Enge Endru Ennode Sollugira En Saththuruvaanaval Adhaip Paarkkumpodhu Vetkam Avalai Moodum; En Kangal Avalaik Kaanum; Ini Veedhigalin Setraippola Midhikkappaduvaal.
11 un Madhilgalai Eduppikkum Naal Varugiradhu; Annaalile Pramaanam Vegudhooram Paravippom.

12 annaalile Aseeriyaamudhal Egipthin Pattanangal Varaikkum, Egipthumudhal Nadhivaraikkum, Oru Samuththiramudhal Maru Samuththiramvaraikkum, Oru Parvadhamudhal Maru Parvadhamvaraikkumulla Janangal Unnidaththirku Varuvaargal.
13 aanaalum Than Kudigalinimiththamum Avargal Kiriyaigaludaiya Palangalinimiththamum Dhesam Paazhaayirukkum.

14 karmelin Naduvile Thaniththu Vanavaasamaayirukkira Umadhu Sudhandharamaana Mandhaiyaagiya Ummudaiya Janaththai Umadhu Kolinaal Meyththarulum; Poorvanaatkalil Meyndhadhupolave Avargal Paasaanilum Keeleyaaththilum Meyvaargalaaga.
15 nee Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappattanaalil Nadandhadhupolave Unnai Adhisayangalaik Kaanappannuven.
16 purajaadhigal Kandu Thangaludaiya Ellaap Paraakkiramaththaiyunkuriththu Vetkappaduvaargal; Kaiyai Vaayinmel Vaiththukkolvaargal; Avargal Kaadhugal Sevidaaip Pogum.

17 paambaippola Mannai Nakkuvaargal; Boomiyin Oorvanavatraippolath Thangal Maraividangalilirundhu Nadunadungip Purappaduvaargal; Namadhu Dhevanaagiyakarththaridaththirkuth Thigilode Serndhu, Unakku Bayappaduvaargal.

18 thamadhu Sudhandharaththil Meedhiyaanavargaludaiya Akkiramaththaip Poruththu, Meerudhalai Mannikkira Dhevareerukku Oppaana Dhevan Yaar? Avar Kirubaiseyya Virumbugirapadiyaal Avar Endrendraikkum Kobam Vaiyaar.
19 avar Thirumba Nammel Iranguvaar; Nammudaiya Akkiramangalai Adakki, Nammudaiya Paavangalaiyellaam Samuththiraththin Aazhangalil Pottuviduvaar.
20 dhevareer Poorvanaatkalmudhal Engal Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyitta Saththiyaththai Yaakkobukkum, Kirubaiyai Aabiragaamukkum Kattalaiyiduveeraaga.
